sentences.en: a company with an exemplary record on environmental issues
sentences.cn: 在处理环境问题方面可作为楷模的公司

sentences.en: At any rate , Sisyphus was given an exemplary punishment.
sentences.cn: 总之, 西绪福斯受到了起杀一儆百作用的惩罚.

sentences.en: Design patterns are exemplary, generalizable solutions to specific classes of design problems.
sentences.cn: 设计模式是针对某类特定的设计问题,可供效仿的概括性解决方案.

sentences.en: Granted, people do not always behave in exemplary ways.
sentences.cn: 但是, 人们是不会以典型的方式来表现的.

sentences.en: He demanded exemplary sentences for those behind the violence.
sentences.cn: 他要求对这起暴力事件的幕后指使者作出惩戒性判决。

sentences.en: His citation says he showed outstanding and exemplary courage.
sentences.cn: 颁给他的嘉奖令称他表现出非凡的勇气，堪为表率。

sentences.en: It's highly laudable and exemplary a thing as it is held to be.
sentences.cn: 这正如所认为的那样是一件值得高度称赞和仿效的事情.

sentences.en: Justina's life had been exemplary, but by ending It'she seemed to have disgraced us all.
sentences.cn: 贾丝蒂娜 堪称楷模, 可在结束生命时却好象让我们大家都丢了脸.

sentences.en: My love life could hardly be described as exemplary.
sentences.cn: 很难说我的爱情生活是典范的.

sentences.en: Plano a two - time Blue Ribbon School and a Texas Exemplary School.
sentences.cn: 普莱诺高中两度被选为蓝带学校并且是一所德克萨斯模范学校.

sentences.en: The CEO was given an award for his exemplary leadership.
sentences.cn: 该执行长因其领导方式堪称模范而获奖.

sentences.en: The Gilligan record in four years as governor was exemplary.
sentences.cn: 吉利根当州长四年,政绩斐然.

sentences.en: The research is not an exhaustive but an exemplary one.
sentences.cn: 这些缺陷是例证性的,而不是穷尽性的.

sentences.en: Underpinning this success has been an exemplary record of innovation.
sentences.cn: 具有典范性的创新确保了这次成功。

sentences.en: Your club's behaviour, on the other hand, always been exemplary.
sentences.cn: 另外一方面, 你们俱乐部的行为一直是模范榜样.

words.tran_cn: 典范的；惩戒性的；可仿效的

trans.tran_cn: 典范的，可作榜样的，惩戒性的
trans.tran_en: excellent and providing a good example for people to follow
